dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3608 : Grand Portage Band Per Capita Adjustment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend the Act of October 19, 1973, concerning taxable income to members of the Grand Portage Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Grand Portage Band Per Capita Adjustment Act.

section.header: Equal treatment of certain per capita income for purposes of Federal assistance
section.text: Paragraph (4) of section 7 of the Act of October 19, 1973 (25 U.S.C. 1407(4)) is amended by striking pursuant to the agreements of such Band and inserting or the Grand Portage Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians, or both, pursuant to the agreements of each Band.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 17, 2014.
